description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You've played the game in the pub, now from the makers of the patented pub amusement machine game you can now download and play this special edition of Spot-The-Difference with the same game play as the pub game on your Xbox 360.
